#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
inline ll inp()
{
ll noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
};
int main()
{
    ll t,n,k,l;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        n=inp();k=inp();//scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
        l=pow(2,n)-1;
        if((k-l)%(l+1)==0)
        printf("ON\n");
        else
        printf("OFF\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
